title: My new book on the new champ select
body:
The game is Called 'League of Champions', the objective is to get onto the rift and play the actual game, it sounds really easy for beginner players, but as they wander through bronze, it seems impossible. The thing is, when this new champion select came into play, it looked so awesome. But then we got fuking tired of coming back in, people thought it was time to play, after the 10th time of champion select. 

This has been an annoying experience. Thanks bronze 5 of Oceania, this is for u.

replies.body: How on earth do people not know how to lock in champions?...
